column4: ok.. so why use aptitude when apt-get does the same thing and aptitude is built on it
aptitude handles downloads better but it really doesnt make a difference
i have a bunch of systems that need upgradeing remotely via just ssh... cant use the udpate-manager gui
than make sure you have no unofficial packages including xgl/compiz/beryl and make sure the package ubuntu-desktop in installed
than feel free to change dapper to edgy and update and upgrade
thanks!  what woudl be the issue if i had those packages xgl?
libgl1-mesa-glx would cause your upgrade to fail badly
hmmm apt-cache search fakeroot returns nothing
fakeroot is in the main repo
shoudl this like give me a fakeroot? deb http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ edgy-updates main restricted
no hold on ill get it
deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ edgy main restricted that will
hmm i have "main restricted" not just "main" so that will give me main and restricted and thus fakeroot.. right?
